attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: John is a tremendous darts player who travels over 140'000 miles a year just to play darts in england.He is a true gentleman of the sport and would never harm the sport.He has won 3 world championships along with countless other trophies.What makes him seem so great is that many times he has been the underdog and has still prevailed. He has inspired me along with many other people to go out and believe in myself.
